description: Overlay blocks touches to underlying chart app instead of passing through. User cannot interact with trading platform.
commonCauses: Interactive UI elements in overlay preventing passthrough
Android version specific touch handling changes
solutions: Remove touch listeners from overlay views
Set clickable = false on all overlay views
Implement selective touch interception only for controls
Test touch passthrough on target Android versions
prevention: Always set FLAG_NOT_TOUCHABLE for non-interactive overlays
Test touch passthrough with real trading apps
Separate interactive controls from overlay layer
Monitor user reports of interaction issues
examples: // For pattern results: FLAG_NOT_TOUCH_MODAL to allow background touches
relatedErrors: Touch events not reaching app below
